name: Rift
description: RIFT is a fantasy massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG). RIFT is very similar to World of Warcraft but requires no subscription.
notes:
Make sure you have cabextract, wine-staging and winetricks installed before installing RIFT. For installation information consult your distribution's documentation.

For RIFT in game graphical glitches change the executable to 32bit in the Glyph launcher's settings and enable CMST in WINE-Staging's winecfg (under the staging tab).
content:
files:
- glyph_installer: http://download.dyn.triongames.com/GlyphInstall-9999-1001.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Glyph/GlyphClient.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c
    src: glyph_installer
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    description: Setting Windows 7 mode for Wine
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Microsoft TrueType Fonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    description: Direct3D Compiler 43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dx9_43
    description: Direct3D DLL 43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: xact_jun2010
    description: DirectX Audio DLL
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: win7
    description: Setting Windows version to 7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GlyphInstall-9999-1001.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  disable_runtime: true
